title: Use a full idea library as a lead magnet
core_action: Publish a structured, searchable list of your best ideas and gate the deeper explanations behind email or paid access.
why_it_works: People want clarity and completeness; a full list builds trust fast and pulls users into your ecosystem.

title: Steal an audience instead of building one
core_action: Partner with creators or communities that already own your ideal audience and collaborate on value-first content.
why_it_works: You shortcut distribution by borrowing trust instead of earning it from scratch.

title: Market to people’s egos, not features
core_action: Design shareable moments where users look smart, accomplished, or early — badges, rankings, certificates.
why_it_works: People promote what makes them look good; your product becomes the vehicle.

title: Apply viral laws instead of guessing
core_action: Audit your landing pages and content using proven viral principles like contrast, emotion, and simplicity.
why_it_works: Virality follows patterns; following laws beats chasing trends.

title: Fix marketing by simplifying it
core_action: Strip your messaging down to one core problem and one clear promise across all channels.

title: Build a mini-tool instead of content
core_action: Create a small, single-purpose tool related to your product and give it away for free.
why_it_works: Tools provide instant value and earn backlinks, shares, and users automatically.

title: Win attention in the first 3 seconds
core_action: Rewrite headlines and above-the-fold sections to communicate value instantly, without scrolling.
why_it_works: Users decide whether to stay or leave almost immediately.

title: Collect inspiration systematically
core_action: Build a swipe file of great marketing examples and reuse proven patterns instead of reinventing.
why_it_works: Most great marketing is iteration, not invention.

title: Avoid expensive offline ads unless justified
core_action: Only use billboards or offline ads when they reinforce an already strong online narrative.
why_it_works: Offline works best as amplification, not as a starting point.

title: Choose brand colors strategically
core_action: Pick colors based on contrast, readability, and emotional intent — not personal taste.
why_it_works: Color impacts trust, clarity, and perceived quality instantly.
